fn.p: Our project began in 2011 as a comparison between France and the United States and was later extended to Finland, India and Russia. As we were interested in long-term trends, we chose to include Warsaw 2013 for these latter countries to lengthen the time-frame of our study.

We also coded other variables, including the addressee of the claim and the way of making the claim. Moreover, we coded for five other types of evaluations besides economic and ecological ones according to the scheme presented by Boltanski and Th√©venot (2006/1991). None of these additional variables and categories were used for the analyses presented in this article.
The codebook is available from the authors upon request.
A full report on intercoder reliability is available from the authors upon request.
